name: Generate a personalized Google Doc for new G Suite users
description:
Every time a new user is added to your G Suite organization, Make will automatically create a personalized contract from a Google Docs template.
The template uses [this example document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OXR7wN4PQwG9yGCt0V0I6mJaxumezIRlbDpMDkSqf6g/edit?usp=sharing).
